name: Franken Kart
description:
Game by

Studio PaintedBlade  https://paintedblade.itch.io/ 

TeamTBA https://teamtba.itch.io/

Franken Kart is the Frankenstein kart game of your dreams!

2 player race off!

Assemble your own kart with monster parts!

Pick a famous creature to pilot your vehicle and use their special ability to capture victory!

Scary good music!

Shocking hand drawn karts!

A,W,D - 1st Player

Arrow keys - 2nd Player

R - Start new race

Escape - Exit the game
